trans-unit.source: Provides access to local and remote processes and enables you to start and stop local system processes.
trans-unit.target: 提供对本地和远程进程的访问权限并使你能够启动和停止本地系统进程。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component provides access to a process that is running on a computer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件提供了对计算机运行的进程的访问。

trans-unit.source: A process, in the simplest terms, is a running app.
trans-unit.target: 进程，简言之，是在正在运行的应用。

trans-unit.source: A thread is the basic unit to which the operating system allocates processor time.
trans-unit.target: 线程是操作系统向其分配处理器时间的基本单位。

trans-unit.source: A thread can execute any part of the code of the process, including parts currently being executed by another thread.
trans-unit.target: 线程可以执行进程，包括当前正由另一个线程执行的部件的任何的代码的部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component is a useful tool for starting, stopping, controlling, and monitoring apps.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件是用于启动、 停止、 控制和监视应用的有用工具。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component, to obtain a list of the processes that are running, or you can start a new process.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件，以获取正在运行的进程的列表或你可以启动一个新进程。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component is used to access system processes.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件用于访问系统进程。

trans-unit.source: After a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component has been initialized, it can be used to obtain information about the running process.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件已初始化，所以可以用来获取有关正在运行的进程的信息。

trans-unit.source: Such information includes the set of threads, the loaded modules (.dll and .exe files), and performance information such as the amount of memory the process is using.
trans-unit.target: 此类信息包括的一组线程，加载的模块 （.dll 和.exe 文件），以及使用的进程的内存量等的性能信息。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。

trans-unit.source: 32-bit processes cannot access the modules of a 64-bit process.
trans-unit.target: 32 位进程无法访问的 64 位进程的模块。

trans-unit.source: If you try to get information about a 64-bit process from a 32-bit process, you will get a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试从 32 位进程中获取有关的 64 位进程的信息，则会出现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception>异常。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit process, on the other hand, can access the modules of a 32-bit process.
trans-unit.target: 一个 64 位进程，另一方面，可以访问是 32 位进程的模块。

trans-unit.source: The process component obtains information about a group of properties all at once.
trans-unit.target: 进程组件获取一组属性有关的信息在一次。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component has obtained information about one member of any group, it will cache the values for the other properties in that group and not obtain new information about the other members of the group until you call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件获取有关任何组的一个成员的信息，它将缓存该组中的其他属性的值并不获得有关的其他成员的组的新信息，直到你调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a property value is not guaranteed to be any newer than the last call to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，属性值不一定要比上次调用任何新<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The group breakdowns are operating-system dependent.
trans-unit.target: 组细分与依赖于操作系统。

trans-unit.source: If you have a path variable declared in your system using quotes, you must fully qualify that path when starting any process found in that location.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有系统中用引号中声明的路径变量，则必须启动任何进程在该位置中找到时，完全限定该路径。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the system will not find the path.
trans-unit.target: 否则，系统将不到的路径。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `c:\mypath` is not in your path, and you add it using quotation marks: `path = %path%;"c:\mypath"`, you must fully qualify any process in `c:\mypath` when starting it.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`c:\mypath`不在你的路径，并将其使用引号引起来添加： `path = %path%;"c:\mypath"`，必须完全符合中的任何进程`c:\mypath`时启动它。

trans-unit.source: A system process is uniquely identified on the system by its process identifier.
trans-unit.target: 由其进程标识符，系统进程唯一标识系统上。

trans-unit.source: Like many Windows resources, a process is also identified by its handle, which might not be unique on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 许多 Windows 资源，如进程也由其句柄，这可能不是在计算机上唯一标识。

trans-unit.source: A handle is the generic term for an identifier of a resource.
trans-unit.target: 句柄是资源的标识符的通用术语。

trans-unit.source: The operating system persists the process handle, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component, even when the process has exited.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统仍保持进程句柄，可通过<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件，即使该进程已退出。

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can get the process's administrative information, such as the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A> (usually either zero for success or a nonzero error code) and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可以获取进程的管理信息，如<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>（通常或者为零表示成功或一个非零错误代码） 和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Handles are an extremely valuable resource, so leaking handles is more virulent than leaking memory.
trans-unit.target: 句柄是极其有价值的资源，所以句柄泄漏内存比危害更大。

trans-unit.source: This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含链接要求，并且在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] Notes
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] 说明

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> class by default uses <xref:System.Console> encodings, which are typically code page encodings, for the input, output, and error streams.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>默认使用的类<xref:System.Console>编码，通常是代码页编码，为输入、 输出和错误流。

trans-unit.source: For example code, on systems whose culture is English (United States), code page 437 is the default encoding for the <xref:System.Console> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例代码，代码页 437 上其区域性为英语 （美国） 的系统，是默认设置编码<xref:System.Console>类。

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] may make only a limited subset of these encodings available.
trans-unit.target: 但是，[!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)]可能提供仅这些编码的有限的子集。

trans-unit.source: If this is the case, it uses <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the default encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现这种情况，它使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>作为默认的编码。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> object depends on specific code page encodings, you can still make them available by doing the following *before* you call any <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> methods:
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>对象依赖于特定的代码页编码，就可以仍可以通过执行以下*之前*调用任何<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>方法：

trans-unit.source: Add a reference to the System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll assembly to your project.
trans-unit.target: 将 System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll 程序集的引用添加到你的项目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the <xref:System.Text.EncodingProvider> object from the <xref:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider.Instance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 检索<xref:System.Text.EncodingProvider>对象<xref:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider.Instance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Text.EncodingProvider> object to the <xref:System.Text.Encoding.RegisterProvider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to make the additional encodings supported by the encoding provider available.
trans-unit.target: 传递<xref:System.Text.EncodingProvider>对象传递给<xref:System.Text.Encoding.RegisterProvider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法使编码的可用提供程序支持的其他编码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> class will then automatically use the default system encoding rather than UTF8, provided that you have registered the encoding provider before calling any <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>类将自动使用默认系统编码而不 UTF8，前提是你在调用任何之前注册编码提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses an instance of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> class to start a process.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用的实例<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>类启动的进程。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> class itself and a static <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> method to start a process.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>类本身和静态<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>方法启动的进程。

trans-unit.source: The following F# example defines a `runProc` function that starts a process, captures all output and error information, and records the number of milliseconds that the process has run.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 F # 示例定义`runProc`启动一个进程的函数捕获所有输出和错误的信息，并记录该进程已运行的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: The `runProc` function has three parameters: the name of application to launch, the arguments to supply to the application, and the starting directory.
trans-unit.target: `runProc`函数具有三个参数： 应用程序以启动，要提供给应用程序，并开始目录的自变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: The code for the `runProc` function was written by [ImaginaryDevelopment](http://fssnip.net/authors/ImaginaryDevelopment) and is available under the [Microsoft Public License](https://opensource.org/licenses/ms-pl).
trans-unit.target: 代码`runProc`函数是否已写入[ImaginaryDevelopment](http://fssnip.net/authors/ImaginaryDevelopment)和位于下[Microsoft 公共许可证](https://opensource.org/licenses/ms-pl)。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MachineName%2A> property, the default is the local computer, (".").
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MachineName%2A>属性，则默认为本地计算机 ("。")。

trans-unit.source: You have two options for associating a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component with a process on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 你有两个选项可用于将新<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件与计算机上的进程。

trans-unit.source: The first option is to use the constructor to create the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component, set the appropriate members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A> property and call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> to associate the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> with a new system process.
trans-unit.target: 第一个选项是使用构造函数来创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件，设置的相应成员<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A>属性并调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>使用新的系统进程。

trans-unit.source: The second option is to associate the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> with a running system process by using <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> or one of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> return values.
trans-unit.target: 第二个选项是将关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>与正在运行的系统进程，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>或之一<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>返回值。

trans-unit.source: If you use a `static` overload of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> method to start a new system process, the method creates a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component and associates it with the process.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用`static`重载<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>方法来启动一个新的系统进程，该方法创建一个新<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件并将它与进程相关联。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to its default value, `true`, you can start applications and documents in a way that is similar to using the `Run` dialog box of the Windows `Start` menu.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为其默认值， `true`，您可以在类似于使用一种方法启动应用程序和文档`Run`对话框中的 windows`Start`菜单。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `false`, you can start only executables.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`false`，你可以开始仅可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: Any executable file that you can call from the command line can be started in one of two ways: by setting the appropriate members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A> property and calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> method with no parameters, or by passing the appropriate parameter to the `static`<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: 可以在两种方式之一中启动，可以从命令行调用任何可执行文件： 通过设置的相应成员<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A>属性和调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>方法提供任何参数，或通过将传递到适当的参数`static` <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>成员。

trans-unit.source: You can create a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component by using the constructor, one of the static <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> overloads, or any of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>, or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件通过使用构造函数中，一个静态<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>重载，或任何<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>，或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you have done so, you have a view into the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 你这样做之后，必须为关联进程的视图。

trans-unit.source: This is not a dynamic view that updates itself automatically when the process properties have changed in memory.
trans-unit.target: 这不会自动更新自身，当进程属性更改在内存中的动态视图。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you must call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A> for the component to update the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> property information in your application.
trans-unit.target: 相反，您必须调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A>以更新组件的<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>应用程序中的属性信息。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the base priority of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联进程的基本优先级。

trans-unit.source: The base priority, which is computed from the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass" /> of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 基本优先级，从关联进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass" /> 计算。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A> of the process is the starting priority for threads created within the associated process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A>的过程是在关联进程内创建的线程的起始优先级。

trans-unit.source: You can view information about the base priority through the System Monitor's Priority Base counter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以查看通过系统监视器的优先级基数计数器的基本优先级有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: Based on the time elapsed or other boosts, the operating system can change the base priority when a process should be placed ahead of others.
trans-unit.target: 基于的时间应早其他放置过程时，运行时间或其他提升，操作系统可以更改的基本优先级。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A> property lets you view the starting priority assigned to a process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A>属性，可以查看分配给过程的起始优先级。

trans-unit.source: However, because it is read-only, you cannot use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A> to set the priority of the process.
trans-unit.target: 但是，因为它是只读的不能使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A>设置进程的优先级。

trans-unit.source: To change the priority, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的优先级，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A> is viewable using the System Monitor, while the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> is not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A>可查看使用系统监视器，而<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>不是。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A> and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> can be viewed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>可以以编程方式查看。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the relationship between <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A> values and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示之间的关系<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BasePriority%2A>值和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: BasePriority
trans-unit.target: BasePriority

trans-unit.source: PriorityClass
trans-unit.target: PriorityClass

trans-unit.source: The following example starts an instance of Notepad.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例启动记事本实例。

trans-unit.source: The example then retrieves and displays various properties of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后检索并显示关联的进程的各种属性。

trans-unit.source: The example detects when the process exits, and displays the process's exit code.
trans-unit.target: 该示例检测时在进程退出，并显示进程的退出代码。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> property to <see langword="false" /> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)；将 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="false" />，以在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 上访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: The process has exited.
trans-unit.target: 该进程已退出。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The process has not started, so there is no process ID.
trans-unit.target: 尚未启动进程，因此没有进程 ID。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Begins asynchronous read operations on the redirected <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> stream of the application.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序的重定向 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> 流上开始进行异步读取操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream can be read synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>可以读取流，同步或异步。

trans-unit.source: Methods such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> perform synchronous read operations on the error output stream of the process.
trans-unit.target: 等方法<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>， <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>同步对执行读取的操作的错误输出流的过程。

trans-unit.source: These synchronous read operations do not complete until the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: 这些同步读取操作不会完成之前关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>写入其<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>流处理时，或关闭流。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> starts asynchronous read operations on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>开始异步读取操作上<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: This method enables the designated event handler for the stream output and immediately returns to the caller, which can perform other work while the stream output is directed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 此方法启用的指定的事件处理程序输出进行流式处理，并立即返回到调用方，流输出定向到事件处理程序时可以执行其他工作。

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to perform asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> for a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> :
trans-unit.target: 按照这些步骤上执行异步读取的操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>:

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> 设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A> 设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: 添加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler must match the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=nameWithType> delegate signature.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序必须与匹配<xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=nameWithType>委托签名。

trans-unit.source: Start the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.
trans-unit.target: 启动<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>。

trans-unit.source: This call starts asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此调用会启动异步读取的操作上<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When asynchronous read operations start, the event handler is called each time the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes a line of text to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: 调用异步读取的操作开始时，事件处理程序时每次关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>写入到的文本行其<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel an asynchronous read operation by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过调用取消异步读的操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The read operation can be canceled by the caller or by the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 由调用方或事件处理程序，可以取消读取的操作。

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> again to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: 取消之后，可以调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>再次继续异步读取的操作。

trans-unit.source: You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on a redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: 不能混合在重定向流上的异步和同步读取的操作。

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: 一次的重定向的流<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>打开在异步或同步模式下，所有进一步读取该流上的操作必须处于相同的模式。

trans-unit.source: For example, do not follow <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> with a call to <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不遵循<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>通过调用<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>上<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>流，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: However, you can read two different streams in different modes.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以读取在不同模式下的两个不同的流。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> and then call <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>，然后调用<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `net view` command to list the available network resources on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用`net view`命令以列出在远程计算机上的可用的网络资源。

trans-unit.source: The user supplies the target computer name as a command-line argument.
trans-unit.target: 在用户提供的目标计算机名称作为命令行自变量。

trans-unit.source: The user can also supply a file name for error output.
trans-unit.target: 用户还可以提供错误输出的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: The example collects the output of the net command, waits for the process to finish, and then writes the output results to the console.
trans-unit.target: 该示例收集的 net 命令、 等待进程完成，然后写入到控制台的输出结果的输出。

trans-unit.source: If the user supplies the optional error file, the example writes errors to the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果在用户提供的可选错误文件，该示例会将错误写入文件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError" /> 属性为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An asynchronous read operation is already in progress on the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> 流上已在进行异步读取操作。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> stream has been used by a synchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 同步读取操作已使用 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> 流。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Begins asynchronous read operations on the redirected <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput" /> stream of the application.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序的重定向 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput" /> 流上开始进行异步读取操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream can be read synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>可以读取流，同步或异步。

trans-unit.source: Methods such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> perform synchronous read operations on the output stream of the process.
trans-unit.target: 等方法<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>， <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>同步对执行读取的操作过程的输出流。

trans-unit.source: These synchronous read operations do not complete until the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: 这些同步读取操作不会完成之前关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>写入其<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流处理时，或关闭流。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> starts asynchronous read operations on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>开始异步读取操作上<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: This method enables a designated event handler for the stream output and immediately returns to the caller, which can perform other work while the stream output is directed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将启用流输出指定的事件处理程序并立即返回到调用方，流输出定向到事件处理程序时可以执行其他工作。

trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput%2A> 设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> event.

trans-unit.target: 启动<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>。

trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>。

trans-unit.source: When asynchronous read operations start, the event handler is called each time the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes a line of text to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: 调用异步读取的操作开始时，事件处理程序时每次关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>写入到的文本行其<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: For example, do not follow <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> with a call to <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不遵循<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>通过调用<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>上<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流，反之亦然。

trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>，然后调用<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to perform asynchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream of the `sort` command.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何执行上的重定向的异步读取的操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流`sort`命令。

trans-unit.source: The `sort` command is a console application that reads and sorts text input.
trans-unit.target: `sort`命令是一个控制台应用程序，读取对文本输入进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an event delegate for the `SortOutputHandler` event handler and associates it with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建一个事件委托，它为`SortOutputHandler`事件处理程序并将其与关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives text lines from the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序接收来自的重定向的文本行<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流，格式文本，并将文本写入屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput" /> 属性为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An asynchronous read operation is already in progress on the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput" /> stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput" /> 流上已在进行异步读取操作。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput" /> stream has been used by a synchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 同步读取操作已使用 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput" /> 流。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous read operation on the redirected <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> stream of an application.
trans-unit.target: 取消在应用程序的重定向 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> 流上执行的异步读取操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> starts an asynchronous read operation on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> 启动异步读取操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A> ends the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A> 结束异步读取操作。

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can resume the asynchronous read operation by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> again.
trans-unit.target: 取消之后，您可以通过来继续异步读取的操作调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>试。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>, all in-progress read operations for <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> are completed and then the event handler is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>，所有正在进行读取操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>完成和事件处理程序，则会禁用。

trans-unit.source: All further redirected output to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> is saved in a buffer.
trans-unit.target: 所有进一步重定向到输出<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>保存在缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: If you re-enable the event handler with a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>, the saved output is sent to the event handler and asynchronous read operations resume.
trans-unit.target: 如果重新启用事件处理程序通过调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>，已保存的输出发送到事件处理程序并异步读取的操作恢复。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the event handler before resuming asynchronous read operations, you must remove the existing event handler before adding the new event handler:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要继续执行异步读取的操作之前更改事件处理程序，则必须在添加新的事件处理程序之前删除现有的事件处理程序：

trans-unit.source: You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: 不能混合使用异步和同步读取的操作的重定向<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: 一次的重定向的流<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>打开在异步或同步模式下，所有进一步读取该流上的操作必须处于相同的模式。

trans-unit.source: If you cancel an asynchronous read operation on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> and then need to read from the stream again, you must use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: 如果您取消异步，则读取上操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>，然后需要从流中读取同样，你必须使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>继续异步读取的操作。

trans-unit.source: Do not follow <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A> with a call to the synchronous read methods of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不要遵循<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>通过调用同步读取方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>如<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>， <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>，或<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example starts the `nmake` command with user supplied arguments.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例启动`nmake`命令与用户提供自变量。

trans-unit.source: The error and output streams are read asynchronously; the collected text lines are displayed to the console as well as written to a log file.
trans-unit.target: 错误和输出流异步读取被写入;收集的文本行是显示到控制台以及写入日志文件。

trans-unit.source: If the command output exceeds a specified number of lines, the asynchronous read operations are canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令输出超出指定的行数，则会取消异步读取的操作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> stream is not enabled for asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: 未针对异步读取操作启用 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> 流。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> starts an asynchronous read operation on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> 启动异步读取操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A> ends the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A> 结束异步读取操作。

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can resume asynchronous read operations by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> again.
trans-unit.target: 取消之后，您可以通过来继续异步读取的操作调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>试。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>, all in-progress read operations for <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> are completed and then the event handler is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>，所有正在进行读取操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>完成和事件处理程序，则会禁用。

trans-unit.source: All further redirected output to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> is saved in a buffer.
trans-unit.target: 所有进一步重定向到输出<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>保存在缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: If you re-enable the event handler with a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>, the saved output is sent to the event handler and asynchronous read operations resume.
trans-unit.target: 如果重新启用事件处理程序通过调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>，已保存的输出发送到事件处理程序并异步读取的操作恢复。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the event handler before resuming asynchronous read operations, you must remove the existing event handler before adding the new event handler:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要继续执行异步读取的操作之前更改事件处理程序，则必须在添加新的事件处理程序之前删除现有的事件处理程序：

trans-unit.source: You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: 不能混合使用异步和同步读取的操作的重定向<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: 一次的重定向的流<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>打开在异步或同步模式下，所有进一步读取该流上的操作必须处于相同的模式。

trans-unit.source: If you cancel an asynchronous read operation on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> and then need to read from the stream again, you must use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: 如果您取消异步，则读取上操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>，然后需要从流中读取同样，你必须使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>继续异步读取的操作。

trans-unit.source: Do not follow <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A> with a call to the synchronous read methods of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不要遵循<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>通过调用同步读取方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>如<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>， <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>，或<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example starts the `nmake` command with user supplied arguments.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例启动`nmake`命令与用户提供自变量。

trans-unit.source: The error and output streams are read asynchronously; the collected text lines are displayed to the console as well as written to a log file.
trans-unit.target: 错误和输出流异步读取被写入;收集的文本行是显示到控制台以及写入日志文件。

trans-unit.source: If the command output exceeds a specified number of lines, the asynchronous read operations are canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令输出超出指定的行数，则会取消异步读取的操作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput" /> stream is not enabled for asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: 未针对异步读取操作启用 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput" /> 流。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Frees all the resources that are associated with this component.
trans-unit.target: 释放与此组件关联的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Close%2A> method causes the process to stop waiting for exit if it was waiting, closes the process handle, and clears process-specific properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Close%2A>方法会导致进程停止等待退出的等待，如果关闭进程句柄，并清除特定于进程的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Close%2A> does not close the standard output, input, and error readers and writers in case they are being referenced externally.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Close%2A> 它们将被从外部引用的情况下，不会关闭标准输出、 输入和错误的读取器和编写器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Dispose%2A> method calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Dispose%2A> 方法调用 <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Close%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Placing the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> object in a `using` block disposes of resources without the need to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 放置<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>对象在`using`块释放资源而无需调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Close%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example starts an instance of Notepad.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例启动记事本实例。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves the physical memory usage of the associated process at 2-second intervals for a maximum of 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 然后在 10 秒的最长 2 秒间隔检索关联进程的物理内存的使用量。

trans-unit.source: The example detects whether the process exits before 10 seconds have elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 该示例检测在进程退出之前经过 10 秒后。

trans-unit.source: The example closes the process if it is still running after 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果它仍在运行在 10 秒后，该示例将关闭进程。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Closes a process that has a user interface by sending a close message to its main window.
trans-unit.target: 通过向进程的主窗口发送关闭消息来关闭拥有用户界面的进程。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the close message was successfully sent; <see langword="false" /> if the associated process does not have a main window or if the main window is disabled (for example if a modal dialog is being shown).
trans-unit.target: 如果成功发送了关闭消息，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果关联进程没有主窗口或禁用了主窗口(例如，如果当前显示模式对话框)，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a process is executing, its message loop is in a wait state.
trans-unit.target: 执行过程时，其消息循环将处于等待状态。

trans-unit.source: The message loop executes every time a Windows message is sent to the process by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 消息循环执行每次操作系统的 Windows 消息发送到进程。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> sends a request to close to the main window, which, in a well-formed application, closes child windows and revokes all running message loops for the application.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>将请求发送到接近主窗口中，其格式正确的应用程序，在关闭子窗口，并撤消应用程序的所有正在运行消息循环。

trans-unit.source: The request to exit the process by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> does not force the application to quit.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用退出该进程的请求<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>不会强制应用程序退出。

trans-unit.source: The application can ask for user verification before quitting, or it can refuse to quit.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以请求用户验证之前退出，或它可以拒绝退出。

trans-unit.source: To force the application to quit, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制应用程序退出，请使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> is identical to that of a user closing an application's main window using the system menu.
trans-unit.target: 行为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>等同于用户关闭应用程序的主窗口中使用系统菜单。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the request to exit the process by closing the main window does not force the application to quit immediately.
trans-unit.target: 因此，通过关闭主窗口退出该进程的请求不会强制应用程序立即退出。

trans-unit.source: Data edited by the process or resources allocated to the process can be lost if you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该进程编辑的数据或分配给进程的资源可能会丢失如果调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> causes an abnormal process termination, and should be used only when necessary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> 导致异常的进程终止，并应仅在必要时使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> enables an orderly termination of the process and closes all windows, so it is preferable for applications with an interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> 启用过程的有序终止并关闭所有窗口，以使更为可取的接口的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> fails, you can use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> to terminate the process.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>失败，你可以使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>终止进程。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> is the only way to terminate processes that do not have graphical interfaces.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> 是终止不具有图形界面的进程的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>仅的本地计算机运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: You cannot cause processes on remote computers to exit.
trans-unit.target: 在退出的远程计算机上，不会导致进程。

trans-unit.source: You can only view information for processes running on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 仅可以查看在远程计算机上运行的进程的信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example starts an instance of Notepad.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例启动记事本实例。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves the physical memory usage of the associated process at 2 second intervals for a maximum of 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 然后在 10 秒最多两秒为间隔检索关联进程的物理内存的使用量。

trans-unit.source: The example detects whether the process exits before 10 seconds have elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 该示例检测在进程退出之前经过 10 秒后。

trans-unit.source: The example closes the process if it is still running after 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果它仍在运行在 10 秒后，该示例将关闭进程。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> property to <see langword="false" /> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)；将 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="false" />，以在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 上访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: The process has already exited.
trans-unit.target: 已经退出该进程。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: No process is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 没有与此 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 对象关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Release all resources used by this process.
trans-unit.target: 释放此进程使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited" /> event should be raised when the process terminates.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在进程终止时是否应引发 <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited" /> event should be raised when the associated process is terminated (through either an exit or a call to <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill" />); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的进程终止（通过退出或者调用 <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill" />）时应引发 <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited" /> 事件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited" /> event is raised even if the value of <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents" /> is <see langword="false" /> when the process exits during or before the user performs a <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited" /> check.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited" />引发事件即使的值<see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents" />是<see langword="false" />时在进程退出期间或在用户执行之前<see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited" />检查。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property suggests whether the component should be notified when the operating system has shut down a process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>属性提供的建议当操作系统已关闭进程时是否应通知该组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property is used in asynchronous processing to notify your application that a process has exited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>属性用于在异步处理，以通知应用程序进程已退出。

trans-unit.source: To force your application to synchronously wait for an exit event (which interrupts processing of the application until the exit event has occurred), use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制应用程序同步等待退出事件 （它中断的应用程序处理，直到退出事件发生为止），请使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you're using Visual Studio and double-click a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component in your project, an <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event delegate and event handler are automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用 Visual Studio 并双击<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件在项目中，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>自动生成事件委托和事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Additional code sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 其他代码集<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: You must change this property to `true` for your event handler to execute when the associated process exits.
trans-unit.target: 必须更改此属性设置为`true`对事件处理程序时要执行关联的进程退出。

trans-unit.source: If the component's <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> value is `true`, or when <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> is `false` and a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> check is invoked by the component, the component can access the administrative information for the associated process, which remains stored by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 如果组件的<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>值是`true`，或当<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>检查调用由组件，组件可以访问关联的进程，后者仍然的管理信息存储由操作系统。

trans-unit.source: Such information includes the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此类信息包括<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After the associated process exits, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> of the component no longer points to an existing process resource.
trans-unit.target: 关联的进程退出后，则<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>的组件不再指向现有进程资源。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it can only be used to access the operating system's information about the process resource.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它可以仅用于访问有关的进程资源的操作系统的信息。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is aware that there are handles to exited processes that haven't been released by <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components, so it keeps the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> information in memory.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统已注意到有尚未通过已发布的已退出进程的句柄<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件，因此它会保留<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>内存中的信息。

trans-unit.source: There's a cost associated with watching for a process to exit.
trans-unit.target: 没有监视进程的退出会带来开销。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event is raised when the associated process terminates.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>在关联的进程终止时，将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Your procedures for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event run at that time.
trans-unit.target: 程序<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>在该时间运行的事件。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, your application starts a process but doesn't require notification of its closure.
trans-unit.target: 有时，你的应用程序将启动一个进程，但不需要其闭包的通知。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application can start Notepad to allow the user to perform text editing but make no further use of the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的应用程序可以启动记事本以允许用户执行文本的编辑，但没有任何进一步利用记事本应用程序。

trans-unit.source: You can choose to avoid notification when the process exits because it's not relevant to the continued operation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择在进程退出，因为它不是与你的应用程序的持续操作时避免通知。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> to `false` can save system resources.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>到`false`可以节省系统资源。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a process that prints a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建输出文件的进程。

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property to cause the process to raise the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event when it exits.
trans-unit.target: 它将设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>属性以使该进程引发<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>退出时的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event handler displays process information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>事件处理程序会显示进程信息。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Puts a <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component in state to interact with operating system processes that run in a special mode by enabling the native property <see langword="SeDebugPrivilege" /> on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 通过启用当前线程的本机属性 <see langword="SeDebugPrivilege" />，将 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件置于与以特殊模式运行的操作系统进程交互的状态。

trans-unit.source: Some operating system processes run in a special mode.
trans-unit.target: 以特殊模式运行某些操作系统进程。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to read properties of or attach to these processes is not possible unless you have called <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnterDebugMode%2A> on the component.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取的属性或将附加到这些进程不能除非你调用了<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnterDebugMode%2A>组件上。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.LeaveDebugMode%2A> when you no longer need access to these processes that run in special mode.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.LeaveDebugMode%2A>不再需要对这些特殊模式运行的进程的访问。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application writes to its redirected <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> stream.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序写入其重定向 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError" /> 流中时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> event indicates that the associated process has written to its redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>事件指示关联的进程已写入其重定向<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: The event only occurs during asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 事件只能在进行异步读取操作上<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To start asynchronous read operations, you must redirect the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>, add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> event, and call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要开始异步读取的操作，必须重定向<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>流<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>，添加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>事件，并调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Thereafter, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> event signals each time the process writes a line to the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, until the process exits or calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此后，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>事件信号进程写入到的重定向行每次<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>流式传输，直到该进程退出，或调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The application that is processing the asynchronous output should call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit> method to ensure that the output buffer has been flushed.
trans-unit.target: 正在处理的异步输出应用程序应调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit>方法，以确保已刷新输出缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Note that specifying a timeout by using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit(System.Int32)> overload does *not* ensure the output buffer has been flushed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意通过使用该指定超时<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit(System.Int32)>重载未*不*确保已刷新输出缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `net view` command to list the available network resources on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用`net view`命令以列出在远程计算机上的可用的网络资源。

trans-unit.source: The user supplies the target computer name as a command-line argument.
trans-unit.target: 在用户提供的目标计算机名称作为命令行自变量。

trans-unit.source: The user can also supply a file name for error output.
trans-unit.target: 用户还可以提供错误输出的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: The example collects the output of the net command, waits for the process to finish, and then writes the output results to the console.
trans-unit.target: 该示例收集的 net 命令、 等待进程完成，然后写入到控制台的输出结果的输出。

trans-unit.source: If the user supplies the optional error file, the example writes errors to the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果在用户提供的可选错误文件，该示例会将错误写入文件。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that the associated process specified when it terminated.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联进程终止时指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The code that the associated process specified when it terminated.
trans-unit.target: 关联进程终止时指定的代码。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A> to get the status that the system process returned when it exited.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>来获取系统过程返回时退出该循环的状态。

trans-unit.source: You can use the exit code much like an integer return value from a `main()` procedure.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的退出代码更像一个整数，返回值从`main()`过程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A> value for a process reflects the specific convention implemented by the application developer for that process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>进程反映该进程的应用程序开发人员实现的特定约定的值。

trans-unit.source: If you use the exit code value to make decisions in your code, be sure that you know the exit code convention used by the application process.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的退出代码值在你的代码中进行决策，请确保你知道使用应用程序进程的退出代码约定。

trans-unit.source: Developers usually indicate a successful exit by an <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A> value of zero, and designate errors by nonzero values that the calling method can use to identify the cause of an abnormal process termination.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员通常表明成功退出<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>值调用的方法可用于确定异常的进程终止原因的非零值零，并且指定的错误。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to follow these guidelines, but they are the convention.
trans-unit.target: 不需要遵循这些指导原则，但它们约定。

trans-unit.source: If you try to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A> before the process has exited, the attempt throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>该进程已退出之前，尝试将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> property first to verify whether the associated process has terminated.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>属性首先以验证是否已终止关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: When standard output has been redirected to asynchronous event handlers, it is possible that output processing will not have completed when <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当已重标准输出定向到异步事件处理程序中时，有可能，输出处理还未完成时<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that asynchronous event handling has been completed, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit> overload that takes no parameter before checking <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保已完成异步事件处理，调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit>在检查之前不接受任何参数的重载<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> method to cause an associated process to exit.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>方法，使关联的进程退出。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of being notified when the associated process exits: synchronously and asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 关联的进程退出时收到通知的两种方式： 同步和异步方式。

trans-unit.source: Synchronous notification relies on calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to pause the processing of your application until the associated component exits.
trans-unit.target: 同步通知依赖于调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>方法来暂停应用程序处理，直到退出关联的组件。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous notification relies on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event.
trans-unit.target: 异步通知依赖于<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>事件。

trans-unit.source: When using asynchronous notification, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> must be set to `true` for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component to receive notification that the process has exited.
trans-unit.target: 使用异步通知时<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>必须设置为`true`为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件可以接收该进程已退出的通知。

trans-unit.source: The following example starts an instance of Notepad.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例启动记事本实例。

trans-unit.source: The example then retrieves and displays various properties of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后检索并显示关联的进程的各种属性。

trans-unit.source: The example detects when the process exits, and displays the process's exit code.
trans-unit.target: 该示例检测时在进程退出，并显示进程的退出代码。

trans-unit.source: The process has not exited.
trans-unit.target: 进程尚未退出。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The process <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 进程 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle" /> 无效。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode" /> property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正尝试访问在远程计算机上运行的进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可用于本地计算机上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a process exits.
trans-unit.target: 在进程退出时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event indicates that the associated process exited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>事件指示关联的进程退出。

trans-unit.source: This occurrence means either that the process terminated (aborted) or successfully closed.
trans-unit.target: 此事件意味着任一进程终止 （中止） 或已成功关闭。

trans-unit.source: This event can occur only if the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 仅当，可能发生此事件的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of being notified when the associated process exits: synchronously and asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 关联的进程退出时收到通知的两种方式： 同步和异步方式。

trans-unit.source: Synchronous notification means calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to block the current thread until the process exits.
trans-unit.target: 同步通知意味着调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>方法进行阻止当前线程，直到在进程退出。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous notification uses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event, which allows the calling thread to continue execution in the meantime.
trans-unit.target: 异步通知使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>事件，允许调用线程继续在此期间执行。

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> must be set to `true` for the calling application to receive the Exited event.
trans-unit.target: 在后一种情况下，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>必须设置为`true`调用应用程序中，若要对 Exited 事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: When the operating system shuts down a process, it notifies all other processes that have registered handlers for the Exited event.
trans-unit.target: 当操作系统关闭进程时，它将通知所有已注册 Exited 事件的处理其他进程。

trans-unit.source: At this time, the handle of the process that just exited can be used to access some properties such as <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> that the operating system maintains until it releases that handle completely.
trans-unit.target: 在此期间，只需退出进程的句柄可以用于访问某些属性如<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>操作系统维护，直到它完全释放该句柄。

trans-unit.source: Even if you have a handle to an exited process, you cannot call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> again to reconnect to the same process.
trans-unit.target: 即使你具有已退出的进程的句柄，不能调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>以重新连接到相同的进程。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> automatically releases the associated process and connects to a process with the same file but an entirely new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>自动释放关联的进程并与同一个文件，但为全新连接到进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the use of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event in Windows Forms applications, see the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.SynchronizingObject%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用有关的详细信息<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>事件在 Windows 窗体应用程序，请参阅<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.SynchronizingObject%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a process that prints a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建输出文件的进程。

trans-unit.source: It raises the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event when the process exits because the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property was set when the process was created.
trans-unit.target: 它会发出<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>事件时在进程退出因为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>时创建的过程已设置属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event handler displays process information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>事件处理程序会显示进程信息。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time that the associated process exited.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联进程退出的时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that indicates when the associated process was terminated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，它指示关联进程终止的时间。

trans-unit.source: If the process has not terminated, attempting to retrieve the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果未终止过程，尝试检索<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>属性引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> before getting the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> property to determine whether the associated process has terminated.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>之前获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>属性来确定是否已终止关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a process that prints a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建输出文件的进程。

trans-unit.source: The process raises the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event when it exits, and the event handler displays the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> property and other process information.
trans-unit.target: 进程引发<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>事件时退出，并在事件处理程序显示<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>属性和其他进程的信息。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), which does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)，不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime" /> property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正尝试访问在远程计算机上运行的进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可用于本地计算机上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: Gets a new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component and associates it with the currently active process.
trans-unit.target: 获取新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件并将其与当前活动的进程关联。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component associated with the process resource that is running the calling application.
trans-unit.target: 与运行调用应用程序的进程资源关联的新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> instance and associate it with the process resource on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法创建一个新<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>实例，并将其与本地计算机上的进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: Like the similar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> methods, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetCurrentProcess%2A> associates an existing resource with a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: 如类似<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>方法，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetCurrentProcess%2A>将现有的资源与新关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves information of the current process, processes running on the local computer, all instances of Notepad running on the local computer, and a specific process on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索当前进程的信息在本地计算机，记事本本地计算机和在本地计算机上的特定进程上运行的所有实例上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves information for the same processes on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将检索远程计算机上的相同的过程信息。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component, and associates it with the existing process resource that you specify.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件，并将其与您指定的现有进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: The system-unique identifier of a process resource.
trans-unit.target: 进程资源的系统唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component, given the identifier of a process on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 返回新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件(给定本地计算机上某个进程的标识符)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component that is associated with the local process resource identified by the <paramref name="processId" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与 <paramref name="processId" /> 参数标识的本地进程资源关联的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component and associate it with a process resource on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法创建一个新<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件并将它与本地计算机上的进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: The process resource must already exist on the computer, because <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%29> does not create a system resource, but rather associates a resource with an application-generated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: 进程资源必须已经存在的计算机上，因为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%29>不会创建一个系统资源，但而是将资源与应用程序生成相关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件。

trans-unit.source: A process <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> can be retrieved only for a process that is currently running on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>可以检索仅为当前计算机运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: After the process terminates, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%29> throws an exception if you pass it an expired identifier.
trans-unit.target: 在进程终止后，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%29>时将其传递一个过期的标识符引发异常。

trans-unit.source: On any particular computer, the identifier of a process is unique.
trans-unit.target: 任何特定计算机上进程的标识符是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%29> returns one process at most.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%29> 最多返回一个进程。

trans-unit.source: If you want to get all the processes running a particular application, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要获取运行特定应用程序，使用的所有进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>。

trans-unit.source: If multiple processes exist on the computer running the specified application, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29> returns an array containing all the associated processes.
trans-unit.target: 如果运行指定的应用程序的计算机上存在多个进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>返回数组，其中包含所有关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: You can query each of these processes in turn for its identifier.
trans-unit.target: 你可以查询每个标识符反过来这些进程。

trans-unit.source: The process identifier can be viewed in the `Processes` panel of the Windows Task Manager.
trans-unit.target: 可以在中查看进程标识符`Processes`面板的 Windows 任务管理器。

trans-unit.source: The `PID` column displays the process identifier that is assigned to a process.
trans-unit.target: `PID`列显示分配给进程的进程标识符。
