trans-unit.source: It then retrieves information for the same processes on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将检索远程计算机上的相同的过程信息。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="processId" /> 参数指定的进程未运行。

trans-unit.target: 此标识符可能已过期。

trans-unit.source: The system-unique identifier of a process resource.
trans-unit.target: 进程资源的系统唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The name of a computer on the network.
trans-unit.target: 网络上计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component, given a process identifier and the name of a computer on the network.
trans-unit.target: 返回新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件(给定进程标识符和网络中计算机的名称)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component that is associated with a remote process resource identified by the <paramref name="processId" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与 <paramref name="processId" /> 参数标识的远程进程资源关联的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component and associate it with a process resource on a remote computer on the network.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法创建一个新<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件并将其与网络上的远程计算机上的进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: The process resource must already exist on the specified computer, because <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%2CSystem.String%29> does not create a system resource, but rather associates a resource with an application-generated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: 进程资源必须已经存在在指定计算机上，因为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%2CSystem.String%29>不会创建一个系统资源，但而是将资源与应用程序生成相关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件。

trans-unit.source: A process <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> can be retrieved only for a process that is currently running on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>可以检索仅为当前计算机运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: After the process terminates, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%2CSystem.String%29> throws an exception if you pass it an expired identifier.
trans-unit.target: 在进程终止后，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%2CSystem.String%29>时将其传递一个过期的标识符引发异常。

trans-unit.source: On any particular computer, the identifier of a process is unique.
trans-unit.target: 任何特定计算机上进程的标识符是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%2CSystem.String%29> returns one process at most.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%28System.Int32%2CSystem.String%29> 最多返回一个进程。

trans-unit.source: If you want to get all the processes running a particular application, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要获取运行特定应用程序，使用的所有进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>。

trans-unit.source: If multiple processes exist on the computer running the specified application, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29> returns an array containing all the associated processes.
trans-unit.target: 如果运行指定的应用程序的计算机上存在多个进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>返回数组，其中包含所有关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: You can query each of these processes in turn for its identifier.
trans-unit.target: 你可以查询每个标识符反过来这些进程。

trans-unit.source: The process identifier can be viewed in the `Processes` panel of the Windows Task Manager.
trans-unit.target: 可以在中查看进程标识符`Processes`面板的 Windows 任务管理器。

trans-unit.source: The `PID` column displays the process identifier that is assigned to a process.
trans-unit.target: `PID`列显示分配给进程的进程标识符。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a `machineName`, the local computer is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定`machineName`，则使用本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can specify the local computer by setting `machineName` to the value "." or to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以通过设置`machineName`为值"。"或为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves information of the current process, processes running on the local computer, all instances of Notepad running on the local computer, and a specific process on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索当前进程的信息在本地计算机，记事本本地计算机和在本地计算机上的特定进程上运行的所有实例上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves information for the same processes on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将检索远程计算机上的相同的过程信息。

trans-unit.source: The process specified by the <paramref name="processId" /> parameter is not running.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="processId" /> 参数指定的进程未运行。

trans-unit.source: The identifier might be expired.
trans-unit.target: 此标识符可能已过期。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter syntax is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 参数的语法无效。

trans-unit.source: The name might have length zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 名称的长度可能为零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The process was not started by this object.
trans-unit.target: 此对象未启动该进程。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> components and associates them with existing process resources.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件的数组，并将它们与现有进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component for each process resource on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 为本地计算机上的每个进程资源创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> that represents all the process resources running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 类型 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 的数组，表示本地计算机上运行的所有进程资源。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create an array of new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components and associate them with all the process resources on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于创建新的数组<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件并将它们与本地计算机上的所有进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: The process resources must already exist on the local computer, because <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> does not create system resources but rather associates resources with application-generated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components.
trans-unit.target: 进程资源必须已经存在的本地计算机上，因为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>不会创建系统资源，但而是将资源与应用程序生成相关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件。

trans-unit.source: Because the operating system itself is running background processes, this array is never empty.
trans-unit.target: 因为操作系统本身正在运行的后台进程，此数组不为空。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to retrieve all the processes running on the computer, you can restrict their number by using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要检索所有计算机上运行的进程，你可以通过使用来限制它们的数量<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> creates a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component that is associated with the process identified on the system by the process identifier that you pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> 创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>与由传递给该方法的进程标识符标识系统上的进程关联的组件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> creates an array of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components whose associated process resources share the executable file you pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> 创建的数组<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>其关联的进程资源共享的可执行文件的组件你传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: Multiple Windows services can be loaded within the same instance of the Service Host process (svchost.exe).
trans-unit.target: 可以在服务主机进程 (svchost.exe) 的同一个实例中加载多个 Windows 服务。

trans-unit.source: GetProcesses does not identify those individual services; for that, see <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A>.
trans-unit.target: GetProcesses 不会确定这些单个服务; 示例：为此，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves information of the current process, processes running on the local computer, all instances of Notepad running on the local computer, and a specific process on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索当前进程的信息在本地计算机，记事本本地计算机和在本地计算机上的特定进程上运行的所有实例上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves information for the same processes on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将检索远程计算机上的相同的过程信息。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: The computer from which to read the list of processes.
trans-unit.target: 从其中读取进程列表的计算机。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component for each process resource on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 为指定计算机上的每个进程资源创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> that represents all the process resources running on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 类型 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 的数组，表示指定计算机上运行的所有进程资源。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create an array of new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components and associate them with all the process resources on the specified (usually remote) computer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于创建新的数组<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件并将其与指定 （通常为远程） 的计算机上的所有进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: The process resources must already exist on the local computer, because <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> does not create system resources but rather associates resources with application-generated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components.
trans-unit.target: 进程资源必须已经存在的本地计算机上，因为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>不会创建系统资源，但而是将资源与应用程序生成相关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件。

trans-unit.source: Because the operating system itself is running background processes, this array is never empty.
trans-unit.target: 因为操作系统本身正在运行的后台进程，此数组不为空。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to retrieve all the processes running on the computer, you can restrict their number by using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要检索所有计算机上运行的进程，你可以通过使用来限制它们的数量<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> creates a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component that is associated with the process identified on the system by the process identifier that you pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> 创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>与由传递给该方法的进程标识符标识系统上的进程关联的组件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> creates an array of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components whose associated process resources share the executable file you pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> 创建的数组<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>其关联的进程资源共享的可执行文件的组件你传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> method is generally used to retrieve the list of process resources running on a remote computer on the network, but you can specify the local computer by passing ".".
trans-unit.target: 此重载<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>方法通常用于检索在网络上的远程计算机上运行的进程资源的列表，但你可以通过传递指定本地计算机"。"。

trans-unit.source: Multiple Windows services can be loaded within the same instance of the Service Host process (svchost.exe).
trans-unit.target: 可以在服务主机进程 (svchost.exe) 的同一个实例中加载多个 Windows 服务。

trans-unit.source: GetProcesses does not identify those individual services; for that, see <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A>.
trans-unit.target: GetProcesses 不会确定这些单个服务; 示例：为此，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves information of the current process, processes running on the local computer, all instances of Notepad running on the local computer, and a specific process on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索当前进程的信息在本地计算机，记事本本地计算机和在本地计算机上的特定进程上运行的所有实例上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves information for the same processes on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将检索远程计算机上的相同的过程信息。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter syntax is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 参数的语法无效。

trans-unit.source: It might have length zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 其长度可能为零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The operating system platform does not support this operation on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统平台不支持在远程计算机上进行此操作。

trans-unit.source: There are problems accessing the performance counter API's used to get process information.
trans-unit.target: 访问用于获取进程信息的性能计数器 API 时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: This exception is specific to Windows NT, Windows 2000, and Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 此异常特定于 Windows NT、Windows 2000 和 Windows XP。

trans-unit.source: A problem occurred accessing an underlying system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问基础系统 API 时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> components and associates them with the existing process resources that all share the specified process name.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件的数组，并将它们与共享指定的进程名称的所有现有进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the process.
trans-unit.target: 该进程的友好名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> components and associates them with all the process resources on the local computer that share the specified process name.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件的数组，并将它们与本地计算机上共享指定的进程名称的所有进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> that represents the process resources running the specified application or file.
trans-unit.target: 类型 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 的数组，表示运行指定应用程序或文件的进程资源。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create an array of new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components and associate them with all the process resources that are running the same executable file on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于创建新的数组<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件并将它们与正在本地计算机上的相同可执行文件的所有进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: The process resources must already exist on the computer, because <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> does not create system resources but rather associates them with application-generated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components.
trans-unit.target: 进程资源必须已经存在的计算机上，因为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>不会创建系统资源，但而是将它们与应用程序生成关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件。

trans-unit.source: A `processName` can be specified for an executable file that is not currently running on the local computer, so the array the method returns can be empty.
trans-unit.target: A`processName`可为指定当前未运行的本地计算机，因此该方法返回的数组可以是空的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: The process name is a friendly name for the process, such as Outlook, that does not include the .exe extension or the path.
trans-unit.target: 进程名称是为了让进程，如 Outlook，不包含扩展名为.exe 或路径的友好名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> is helpful for getting and manipulating all the processes that are associated with the same executable file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> 可帮助获取和操作与相同的可执行文件相关联的所有进程。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can pass an executable file name as the `processName` parameter, in order to shut down all the running instances of that executable file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以传递作为可执行文件名`processName`参数，以便关闭该可执行文件的所有正在运行的实例。

trans-unit.source: Although a process <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> is unique to a single process resource on the system, multiple processes on the local computer can be running the application specified by the `processName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 尽管进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>是唯一的系统上的单个进程资源，本地计算机上的多个进程可以运行指定的应用程序`processName`参数。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> returns one process at most, but <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> returns an array containing all the associated processes.
trans-unit.target: 因此， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> ，最多返回一个进程但<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>返回数组，其中包含所有关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: If you need to manipulate the process using standard API calls, you can query each of these processes in turn for its identifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要操作使用标准的 API 调用的进程，可以查询每个标识符反过来这些进程。

trans-unit.source: You cannot access process resources through the process name alone but, once you have retrieved an array of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components that have been associated with the process resources, you can start, terminate, and otherwise manipulate the system resources.
trans-unit.target: 无法访问进程资源，通过单独的进程名称中，但一旦检索到的数组<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>已相关联的组件与进程资源，你可以启动、 终止和以其他方式操作的系统资源。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves information of the current process, processes running on the local computer, all instances of Notepad running on the local computer, and a specific process on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索当前进程的信息在本地计算机，记事本本地计算机和在本地计算机上的特定进程上运行的所有实例上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves information for the same processes on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将检索远程计算机上的相同的过程信息。

trans-unit.source: There are problems accessing the performance counter API's used to get process information.
trans-unit.target: 访问用于获取进程信息的性能计数器 API 时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: This exception is specific to Windows NT, Windows 2000, and Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 此异常特定于 Windows NT、Windows 2000 和 Windows XP。

trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the process.
trans-unit.target: 该进程的友好名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a computer on the network.
trans-unit.target: 网络上计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> components and associates them with all the process resources on a remote computer that share the specified process name.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create an array of new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components and associate them with all the process resources that are running the same executable file on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于创建新的数组<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件并将它们与正在运行指定的计算机上的相同可执行文件的所有进程资源关联。

trans-unit.source: A `processName` can be specified for an executable file that is not currently running on the local computer, so the array the method returns can be empty.
trans-unit.target: A`processName`可为指定当前未运行的本地计算机，因此该方法返回的数组可以是空的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: The process name is a friendly name for the process, such as Outlook, that does not include the .exe extension or the path.
trans-unit.target: 进程名称是为了让进程，如 Outlook，不包含扩展名为.exe 或路径的友好名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> is helpful for getting and manipulating all the processes that are associated with the same executable file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> 可帮助获取和操作与相同的可执行文件相关联的所有进程。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can pass an executable file name as the `processName` parameter, in order to shut down all the running instances of that executable file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以传递作为可执行文件名`processName`参数，以便关闭该可执行文件的所有正在运行的实例。

trans-unit.source: Although a process <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> is unique to a single process resource on the system, multiple processes on the local computer can be running the application specified by the `processName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 尽管进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>是唯一的系统上的单个进程资源，本地计算机上的多个进程可以运行指定的应用程序`processName`参数。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> returns one process at most, but <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> returns an array containing all the associated processes.
trans-unit.target: 因此， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> ，最多返回一个进程但<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>返回数组，其中包含所有关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: If you need to manipulate the process using standard API calls, you can query each of these processes in turn for its identifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要操作使用标准的 API 调用的进程，可以查询每个标识符反过来这些进程。

trans-unit.source: You cannot access process resources through the process name alone but, once you have retrieved an array of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components that have been associated with the process resources, you can start, terminate, and otherwise manipulate the system resources.
trans-unit.target: 无法访问进程资源，通过单独的进程名称中，但一旦检索到的数组<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>已相关联的组件与进程资源，你可以启动、 终止和以其他方式操作的系统资源。

trans-unit.source: You can use this overload to get processes on the local computer as well as on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此重载可用于在本地计算机上以及在远程计算机获取进程。

trans-unit.source: Use "." to specify the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用"。"若要指定本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: Another overload exists that uses the local computer by default.
trans-unit.target: 存在另一个重载，默认情况下使用本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: You can access processes on remote computers only to view information, such as statistics, about the processes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问仅以查看有关进程的信息，统计信息，如的远程计算机上的进程。

trans-unit.source: You cannot close, terminate (using <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>), or start processes on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 无法关闭，终止 (使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>)，或在远程计算机上启动进程。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves information of the current process, processes running on the local computer, all instances of Notepad running on the local computer, and a specific process on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索当前进程的信息在本地计算机，记事本本地计算机和在本地计算机上的特定进程上运行的所有实例上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves information for the same processes on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将检索远程计算机上的相同的过程信息。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter syntax is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 参数的语法无效。

trans-unit.source: It might have length zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 其长度可能为零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The operating system platform does not support this operation on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统平台不支持在远程计算机上进行此操作。

trans-unit.source: There are problems accessing the performance counter API's used to get process information.
trans-unit.target: 访问用于获取进程信息的性能计数器 API 时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: This exception is specific to Windows NT, Windows 2000, and Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 此异常特定于 Windows NT、Windows 2000 和 Windows XP。

trans-unit.source: A problem occurred accessing an underlying system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问基础系统 API 时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the native handle of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联进程的本机句柄。

trans-unit.source: The handle that the operating system assigned to the associated process when the process was started.
trans-unit.target: 进程启动时操作系统向关联进程分配的句柄。

trans-unit.source: The system uses this handle to keep track of process attributes.
trans-unit.target: 系统使用此句柄来跟踪过程属性。

trans-unit.source: An application can obtain a handle to a process that can be used as a parameter to many process-information and control functions.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以获得到的进程，可以使用作为参数传递给许多进程信息和控制功能的句柄。

trans-unit.source: You can use this handle to initialize a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> or to call native methods with platform invoke.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此句柄初始化<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>或调用与平台的本机方法调用。

trans-unit.source: This process handle is private to an application--in other words, process handles cannot be shared.
trans-unit.target: 此进程句柄是私有的某个应用程序，换而言之，句柄不能共享的过程。

trans-unit.source: A process also has a process <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> which, unlike the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>, is unique and, therefore, valid throughout the system.
trans-unit.target: 进程也有过程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>这与<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>，是唯一的因此，在整个系统有效。

trans-unit.source: Only processes started through a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> property of the corresponding <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> instances.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用启动仅进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>的相应属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>实例。

trans-unit.source: The process has not been started or has exited.
trans-unit.target: 该进程尚未启动或已退出。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle" /> property cannot be read because there is no process associated with this <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 不能读取 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle" /> 属性，因为没有与此 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 实例关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> instance has been attached to a running process but you do not have the necessary permissions to get a handle with full access rights.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 实例已附加到正在运行的进程，但您没有获取具有完全访问权限的句柄所需的权限。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle" /> property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正尝试访问在远程计算机上运行的进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可用于本地计算机上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of handles opened by the process.
trans-unit.target: 获取由进程打开的句柄数。

trans-unit.source: The number of operating system handles the process has opened.
trans-unit.target: 进程打开的操作系统句柄数。

trans-unit.source: Handles provide a way for a process to refer to objects.
trans-unit.target: 句柄提供使进程可以引用的对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: A process can obtain handles to files, resources, message queues, and many other operating system objects.
trans-unit.target: 进程可以获取指向文件、 资源、 消息队列和许多其他操作系统对象的句柄。

trans-unit.source: The operating system reclaims the memory associated with the process only when the handle count is zero.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统回收仅当句柄计数为零时，才与进程关联的内存。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> property to <see langword="false" /> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)；将 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="false" />，以在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 上访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the associated process has been terminated.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示关联进程是否已终止的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operating system process referenced by the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component has terminated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件引用的操作系统进程已终止，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A value of `true` for <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> indicates that the associated process has terminated, either normally or abnormally.
trans-unit.target: 值为`true`为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>指示关联的进程已终止，正常或异常。

trans-unit.source: You can request or force the associated process to exit by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以请求，也可以强制关联的进程退出通过调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If a handle is open to the process, the operating system releases the process memory when the process has exited, but retains administrative information about the process, such as the handle, exit code, and exit time.
trans-unit.target: 如果到进程打开的句柄，操作系统将释放的进程内存时进程已退出，但会保留有关过程，如句柄、 退出代码和退出时的管理信息。

trans-unit.source: To get this information, you can use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取此信息，可以使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: These properties are populated automatically for processes that were started by this component.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性将自动填充此组件已启动的进程。

trans-unit.source: The administrative information is released when all the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components that are associated with the system process are destroyed and hold no more handles to the exited process.
trans-unit.target: 发布的管理信息时所有<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>与系统进程关联的组件将销毁，并没有更多的句柄保留至已退出进程。

trans-unit.source: A process can terminate independently of your code.
trans-unit.target: 独立于你的代码可以终止进程。

trans-unit.source: If you started the process using this component, the system updates the value of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> automatically, even if the associated process exits independently.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在开始使用此组件的过程，系统将更新的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>自动，即使独立关联的进程退出。

trans-unit.source: When standard output has been redirected to asynchronous event handlers, it is possible that output processing will not have completed when this property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当已重标准输出定向到异步事件处理程序中时，有可能时此属性返回不具有完成输出处理`true`。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that asynchronous event handling has been completed, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit> overload that takes no parameter before checking <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保已完成异步事件处理，调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit>在检查之前不接受任何参数的重载<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example starts an instance of Notepad.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例启动记事本实例。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves the physical memory usage of the associated process at 2 second intervals for a maximum of 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 然后在 10 秒最多两秒为间隔检索关联进程的物理内存的使用量。

trans-unit.source: The example detects whether the process exits before 10 seconds have elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 该示例检测在进程退出之前经过 10 秒后。

trans-unit.source: The example closes the process if it is still running after 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果它仍在运行在 10 秒后，该示例将关闭进程。

trans-unit.source: There is no process associated with the object.
trans-unit.target: 没有与此对象关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: The exit code for the process could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 无法检索该进程的退出代码。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited" /> property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正尝试访问在远程计算机上运行的进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可用于本地计算机上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联进程的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The system-generated unique identifier of the process that is referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 实例引用的、由系统生成的进程的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The process <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> is not valid if the associated process is not running.
trans-unit.target: 进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>不是有效如果关联的进程未运行。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should ensure that the process is running before attempting to retrieve the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您应确保在尝试检索之前正在运行进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Until the process terminates, the process identifier uniquely identifies the process throughout the system.
trans-unit.target: 在进程终止，直到进程标识符唯一地标识在整个系统的过程。

trans-unit.source: You can connect a process that is running on a local or remote computer to a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> instance by passing the process identifier to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以连接到新的本地或远程计算机运行的进程<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>实例通过将传递到的进程标识符<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> is a `static` method that creates a new component and sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> property for the new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> instance automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> 是`static`创建一个新的组件的方法和设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>新属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>自动实例。

trans-unit.source: Process identifiers can be reused by the system.
trans-unit.target: 可以由系统重用进程标识符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> property value is unique only while the associated process is running.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>属性值是唯一的仅在关联的进程正在运行时。

trans-unit.source: After the process has terminated, the system can reuse the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> property value for an unrelated process.
trans-unit.target: 进程已终止后，系统可以重复使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>不相关的进程的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Because the identifier is unique on the system, you can pass it to other threads as an alternative to passing a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> instance.
trans-unit.target: 因为该标识符是唯一系统上，你可以将其传递给其他线程作为传递的替代方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>实例。

trans-unit.source: This action can save system resources yet guarantee that the process is correctly identified.
trans-unit.target: 此操作可以节省系统资源，又可保证正确标识进程。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to obtain the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> for all running instances of an application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>所有运行的应用程序实例。

trans-unit.source: The code creates a new instance of Notepad, lists all the instances of Notepad, and then allows the user to enter the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> number to remove a specific instance.
trans-unit.target: 代码创建记事本的新实例，将列出的记事本的所有实例，然后允许用户输入<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>编号，以删除特定的实例。

trans-unit.source: The process's <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id" /> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 尚未设置此进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: There is no process associated with this <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 没有与此 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 对象关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> property to <see langword="false" /> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)；将 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="false" />，以在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 上访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Immediately stops the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 立即停止关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> forces a termination of the process, while <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> only requests a termination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> 强制终止的进程，而<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>只请求在终止。

trans-unit.source: When a process with a graphical interface is executing, its message loop is in a wait state.
trans-unit.target: 具有图形界面的进程执行时，其消息循环将处于等待状态。

trans-unit.source: The message loop executes every time a Windows message is sent to the process by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 消息循环执行每次操作系统的 Windows 消息发送到进程。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> sends a request to close to the main window, which, in a well-formed application, closes child windows and revokes all running message loops for the application.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>将请求发送到接近主窗口中，其格式正确的应用程序，在关闭子窗口，并撤消应用程序的所有正在运行消息循环。

trans-unit.source: The request to exit the process by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> does not force the application to quit.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用退出该进程的请求<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>不会强制应用程序退出。

trans-unit.source: The application can ask for user verification before quitting, or it can refuse to quit.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以请求用户验证之前退出，或它可以拒绝退出。

trans-unit.source: To force the application to quit, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制应用程序退出，请使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> is identical to that of a user closing an application's main window using the system menu.
trans-unit.target: 行为<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>等同于用户关闭应用程序的主窗口中使用系统菜单。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the request to exit the process by closing the main window does not force the application to quit immediately.
trans-unit.target: 因此，通过关闭主窗口退出该进程的请求不会强制应用程序立即退出。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> method executes asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>方法以异步方式执行。

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> method, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to wait for the process to exit, or check the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> property to determine if the process has exited.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>方法中，调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>方法来等待进程退出，或检查<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>属性来确定该进程已退出。

trans-unit.source: Data edited by the process or resources allocated to the process can be lost if you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该进程编辑的数据或分配给进程的资源可能会丢失如果调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> causes an abnormal process termination and should be used only when necessary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> 导致异常的进程终止，应仅在必要时使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> enables an orderly termination of the process and closes all windows, so it is preferable for applications with an interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> 启用过程的有序终止并关闭所有窗口，以使更为可取的接口的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> fails, you can use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> to terminate the process.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>失败，你可以使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>终止进程。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> is the only way to terminate processes that do not have graphical interfaces.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> 是终止不具有图形界面的进程的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>仅的本地计算机运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: You cannot cause processes on remote computers to exit.
trans-unit.target: 在退出的远程计算机上，不会导致进程。

trans-unit.source: You can only view information for processes running on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 仅可以查看在远程计算机上运行的进程的信息。

trans-unit.source: If the call to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> method is made while the process is currently terminating, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception> is thrown for Access Denied.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>方法由时当前在终止进程，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception>引发因访问被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: The associated process could not be terminated.
trans-unit.target: 无法终止相关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The process is terminating.
trans-unit.target: 进程将终止。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The associated process is a Win16 executable.
trans-unit.target: 关联的进程是 Win16 可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: You are attempting to call <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill" /> for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正尝试为远程计算机上运行的进程调用 <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill" />。

trans-unit.source: The method is available only for processes running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 该方法仅对本地计算机上运行的进程可用。

trans-unit.source: The process has already exited.
trans-unit.target: 已经退出该进程。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: There is no process associated with this <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 没有与此 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 对象关联的进程。

trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Takes a <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> component out of the state that lets it interact with operating system processes that run in a special mode.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 组件离开允许它与以特殊模式运行的操作系统进程交互的状态。

trans-unit.source: Some operating system processes run in a special mode.
trans-unit.target: 以特殊模式运行某些操作系统进程。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to read properties of or attach to these processes is not possible unless you have called <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnterDebugMode%2A> on the component.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取的属性或将附加到这些进程不能除非你调用了<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnterDebugMode%2A>组件上。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.LeaveDebugMode%2A> when you no longer need access to these processes that run in special mode.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.LeaveDebugMode%2A>不再需要对这些特殊模式运行的进程的访问。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the computer the associated process is running on.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联进程正在其上运行的计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer that the associated process is running on.
trans-unit.target: 关联进程正在其上运行的计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can view statistical data and process information for processes running on remote computers but you cannot call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>, or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 你可以查看统计数据，并在远程计算机上，但是你运行的进程的进程信息不能调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>，或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>在远程计算机上。

trans-unit.source: When the associated process is executing on the local machine, this property returns a period (".") for the machine name.
trans-unit.target: 此属性关联的进程执行时在本地计算机上，返回一个句点 ("。") 为计算机名称。

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to get the correct machine name.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性获取正确的计算机名称。

trans-unit.source: To use the following example you must first start at least one instance of Notepad on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用下面的示例，你必须先在远程计算机上启动记事本的至少一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The example requests the name of the remote computer on which Notepad is running, and then displays the respective <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ProcessName%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MachineName%2A> properties for each instance.
trans-unit.target: 该示例请求的远程计算机记事本正在运行，且然后分别显示名称<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ProcessName%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MachineName%2A>每个实例的属性。

trans-unit.source: There is no process associated with this <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 没有与此 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 对象关联的进程。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the main module for the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联进程的主模块。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> that was used to start the process.
trans-unit.target: 用于启动进程的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" />。

trans-unit.source: A process module represents a.dll or .exe file that is loaded into a particular process.
trans-unit.target: 进程模块表示加载到特定的进程的.dll 或.exe 文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainModule%2A> property lets you view information about the executable used to start the process, including the module name, file name, and module memory details.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainModule%2A>属性允许你查看有关用于启动进程，包括模块名称、 文件名和模块内存详细信息的可执行文件的信息。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainModule" /> property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正尝试访问在远程计算机上运行的进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainModule" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可用于本地计算机上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit process is trying to access the modules of a 64-bit process.
trans-unit.target: 32 位进程正尝试访问 64 位进程的模块。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> to <see langword="false" /> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)；将 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> 设置为 <see langword="false" />，以在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 上访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: The process <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id" /> is not available.
trans-unit.target: 进程 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id" /> 不可用。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The process has exited.
trans-unit.target: 该进程已退出。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the window handle of the main window of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联进程主窗口的窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: The system-generated window handle of the main window of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 关联进程主窗口的系统生成的窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: The main window is the window opened by the process that currently has the focus (the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TopLevel%2A> form).
trans-unit.target: 主窗口是由当前具有焦点的进程打开的窗口 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TopLevel%2A>窗体)。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A> method to refresh the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> object to get the current main window handle if it has changed.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A>方法来刷新<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>要获取当前的主窗口句柄，如果它已更改对象。

trans-unit.source: In general, because the window handle is cached, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A> beforehand to guarantee that you’ll retrieve the current handle.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，因为缓存的窗口句柄，则使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A>事先若要确保你将检索当前句柄。

trans-unit.source: You can get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle%2A> property only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle%2A>仅的本地计算机运行的进程的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle%2A> property is a value that uniquely identifies the window that is associated with the process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle%2A>属性是用于唯一标识与进程相关联的窗口的值。

trans-unit.source: A process has a main window associated with it only if the process has a graphical interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个进程有一个仅当该过程提供一个图形界面与之关联的主窗口。

trans-unit.source: If the associated process does not have a main window, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle%2A> value is zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的进程没有主窗口中，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle%2A>值为零。

trans-unit.source: The value is also zero for processes that have been hidden, that is, processes that are not visible in the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 值也是对于进程已被隐藏，则为零，即处理，在任务栏中不可见。

trans-unit.source: This can be the case for processes that appear as icons in the notification area, at the far right of the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会在通知区域中，在任务栏最右侧显示为图标的进程的情况。

trans-unit.source: If you have just started a process and want to use its main window handle, consider using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForInputIdle%2A> method to allow the process to finish starting, ensuring that the main window handle has been created.
trans-unit.target: 如果你刚刚启动了一个进程，并想要使用其主窗口句柄，请考虑使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForInputIdle%2A>方法以允许该进程完成后从开始，确保已创建了主窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否则，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle" /> is not defined because the process has exited.
trans-unit.target: 未定义 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle" />，因为进程已退出。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle" /> property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正尝试访问在远程计算机上运行的进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可用于本地计算机上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> to <see langword="false" /> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)；将 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> 设置为 <see langword="false" />，以在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 上访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption of the main window of the process.
trans-unit.target: 获取进程的主窗口标题。

trans-unit.source: The main window title of the process.
trans-unit.target: 进程的主窗口标题。

trans-unit.source: A process has a main window associated with it only if the process has a graphical interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个进程有一个仅当该过程提供一个图形界面与之关联的主窗口。

trans-unit.source: If the associated process does not have a main window (so that <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle%2A> is zero), <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowTitle%2A> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的进程没有主窗口 (以便<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowHandle%2A>为零)，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowTitle%2A>为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If you have just started a process and want to use its main window title, consider using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForInputIdle%2A> method to allow the process to finish starting, ensuring that the main window handle has been created.
trans-unit.target: 如果你刚刚启动了一个进程，并想要使用其主窗口标题，请考虑使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForInputIdle%2A>方法以允许该进程完成后从开始，确保已创建了主窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the system throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 否则，系统将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The main window is the window that currently has the focus; note that this might not be the primary window for the process.
trans-unit.target: 主窗口是当前具有焦点，则窗口请注意，这可能不是进程的主窗口。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A> method to refresh the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> object to get the current main window handle if it has changed.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A>方法来刷新<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>要获取当前的主窗口句柄，如果它已更改对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example starts an instance of Notepad and retrieves the caption of the main window of the process.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例启动记事本实例，并检索进程主窗口的标题。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowTitle" /> property is not defined because the process has exited.
trans-unit.target: 未定义 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowTitle" /> 属性，因为进程已退出。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowTitle" /> property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正尝试访问在远程计算机上运行的进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MainWindowTitle" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可用于本地计算机上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> to <see langword="false" /> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)；将 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> 设置为 <see langword="false" />，以在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 上访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum allowable working set size, in bytes, for the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联进程允许的最大工作集大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The maximum working set size that is allowed in memory for the process, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 内存中允许的进程的最大工作集大小(以字节为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The working set of a process is the set of memory pages currently visible to the process in physical RAM memory.
trans-unit.target: 进程工作集是物理 RAM 内存中的当前可见的进程的内存页的集合。

trans-unit.source: These pages are resident and available for an application to use without triggering a page fault.
trans-unit.target: 这些页面为常驻性并且可用于应用程序使用而不会触发页面错误。

trans-unit.source: The working set includes both shared and private data.
trans-unit.target: 工作集包括共享和私有数据。

trans-unit.source: The shared data includes the pages that contain all the instructions that your application executes, including the pages in your .dll files and the system.dll files.
trans-unit.target: 共享的数据包括包含应用程序的执行，包括页面.dll 文件和 system.dll 文件中的所有说明的页。

trans-unit.source: As the working set size increases, memory demand increases.
trans-unit.target: 随着工作集大小的增加，则会增加内存需求。

trans-unit.source: A process has minimum and maximum working set sizes.
trans-unit.target: 进程都有最小和最大工作集大小。

trans-unit.source: Each time a process resource is created, the system reserves an amount of memory equal to the minimum working set size for the process.
trans-unit.target: 每次创建一个进程资源时，系统都会保留等于最小工作集大小的进程的内存量。

trans-unit.source: The virtual memory manager attempts to keep at least the minimum amount of memory resident when the process is active, but it never keeps more than the maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟内存管理器尝试保持至少最小内存量常驻进程处于活动状态，但决不会保留的最大大小超过时。

trans-unit.source: The system sets the default working set sizes.
trans-unit.target: 系统设置的默认工作集大小。

trans-unit.source: You can modify these sizes using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MaxWorkingSet%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MinWorkingSet%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改使用这些大小<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MaxWorkingSet%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MinWorkingSet%2A>成员。

trans-unit.source: However, setting these values does not guarantee that the memory will be reserved or resident.
trans-unit.target: 但是，设置这些值不保证内存将保留或驻留。

trans-unit.source: When you increase the working set size of a process, you take physical memory away from the rest of the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果增加进程工作集大小，你需要从系统的其余部分的物理内存。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you do not request a minimum or maximum working set size that is too large, because doing so can degrade system performance.
trans-unit.target: 确保你不会请求是太大，因为这样做会降低系统性能最小值或最大工作集大小。

trans-unit.source: The maximum working set size is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 最大的工作集大小无效。

trans-unit.source: It must be greater than or equal to the minimum working set size.
trans-unit.target: 它必须大于或等于最小的工作集大小。

trans-unit.source: Working set information cannot be retrieved from the associated process resource.
trans-unit.target: 无法从关联的进程资源中检索工作集信息。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The process identifier or process handle is zero because the process has not been started.
trans-unit.target: 进程标识符或进程句柄为零，因为尚未启动该进程。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MaxWorkingSet" /> property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正尝试访问在远程计算机上运行的进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MaxWorkingSet" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可用于本地计算机上运行的进程。

trans-unit.target: 进程 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id" /> 不可用。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The process has exited.
trans-unit.target: 该进程已退出。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), which does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)，不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowable working set size, in bytes, for the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联进程允许的最小工作集大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The minimum working set size that is required in memory for the process, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 内存中进程所需的最小工作集大小(以字节为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The working set of a process is the set of memory pages currently visible to the process in physical RAM memory.
trans-unit.target: 进程工作集是物理 RAM 内存中的当前可见的进程的内存页的集合。

trans-unit.source: These pages are resident and available for an application to use without triggering a page fault.
trans-unit.target: 这些页面为常驻性并且可用于应用程序使用而不会触发页面错误。

trans-unit.source: The working set includes both shared and private data.
trans-unit.target: 工作集包括共享和私有数据。

trans-unit.source: The shared data includes the pages that contain all the instructions that your application executes, including the pages in your .dll files and the system.dll files.
trans-unit.target: 共享的数据包括包含应用程序的执行，包括页面.dll 文件和 system.dll 文件中的所有说明的页。

trans-unit.source: As the working set size increases, memory demand increases.
trans-unit.target: 随着工作集大小的增加，则会增加内存需求。

trans-unit.source: A process has minimum and maximum working set sizes.
trans-unit.target: 进程都有最小和最大工作集大小。

trans-unit.source: Each time a process resource is created, the system reserves an amount of memory equal to the minimum working set size for the process.
trans-unit.target: 每次创建一个进程资源时，系统都会保留等于最小工作集大小的进程的内存量。

trans-unit.source: The virtual memory manager attempts to keep at least the minimum amount of memory resident when the process is active, but it never keeps more than the maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟内存管理器尝试保持至少最小内存量常驻进程处于活动状态，但决不会保留的最大大小超过时。

trans-unit.source: The system sets the default working set sizes.
trans-unit.target: 系统设置的默认工作集大小。

trans-unit.source: You can modify these sizes using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MaxWorkingSet%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MinWorkingSet%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改使用这些大小<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MaxWorkingSet%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MinWorkingSet%2A>成员。

trans-unit.source: However, setting these values does not guarantee that the memory will be reserved or resident.
trans-unit.target: 但是，设置这些值不保证内存将保留或驻留。

trans-unit.source: When you increase the working set size of a process, you take physical memory away from the rest of the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果增加进程工作集大小，你需要从系统的其余部分的物理内存。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you do not request a minimum or maximum working set size that is too large, because doing so can degrade system performance.
trans-unit.target: 确保你不会请求是太大，因为这样做会降低系统性能最小值或最大工作集大小。

trans-unit.source: The minimum working set size is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 最小工作集大小无效。

trans-unit.source: It must be less than or equal to the maximum working set size.
trans-unit.target: 它必须小于或等于最大工作集大小。

trans-unit.source: Working set information cannot be retrieved from the associated process resource.
trans-unit.target: 无法从关联的进程资源中检索工作集信息。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The process identifier or process handle is zero because the process has not been started.
trans-unit.target: 进程标识符或进程句柄为零，因为尚未启动该进程。

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MinWorkingSet" /> property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正尝试访问在远程计算机上运行的进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.MinWorkingSet" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可用于本地计算机上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: The process <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id" /> is not available.
trans-unit.target: 进程 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id" /> 不可用。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The process has exited.
trans-unit.target: 该进程已退出。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), which does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)，不支持此属性。

trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the modules that have been loaded by the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 获取已由关联进程加载的模块。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> that represents the modules that have been loaded by the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 类型 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> 的数组，表示已由关联进程加载的模块。

trans-unit.source: A process module represents a.dll or .exe file that is loaded into a particular process.
trans-unit.target: 进程模块表示加载到特定的进程的.dll 或.exe 文件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule> instance lets you view information about a module, including the module name, file name, and module memory details.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule>实例，您可以查看有关模块，包括模块名称、 文件名和模块内存详细信息的信息。

trans-unit.source: A process can load multiple modules into memory.
trans-unit.target: 一个进程可以加载到内存中的多个模块。

trans-unit.source: For example,.exe files that load additional .dll files have multiple modules.
trans-unit.target: 例如，加载其他.dll 文件的.exe 文件具有多个模块。

trans-unit.source: After starting the process, this collection is empty until the system has loaded the process.
trans-unit.target: 之后启动该进程，此集合为空直到系统加载该进程。

trans-unit.source: If the process has a main window, you can call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForInputIdle%2A> before retrieving this property to ensure that the collection is nonempty when you get the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果进程都有一个主窗口，则可以调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForInputIdle%2A>之前检索此属性，以确保集合非空时你可以获取的列表。

trans-unit.source: You are attempting to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Modules" /> property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你正试图访问在远程计算机上运行的进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Modules" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可用于本地计算机上运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: The process <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id" /> is not available.
trans-unit.target: 进程 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id" /> 不可用。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> to <see langword="false" /> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)；将 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute" /> 设置为 <see langword="false" />，以在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 上访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: You are attempting to access the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Modules" /> property for either the system process or the idle process.
trans-unit.target: 您尝试访问系统进程或 Idle 进程的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.Modules" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: These processes do not have modules.
trans-unit.target: 这些进程没有模块。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of nonpaged system memory, in bytes, allocated for the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 获取为关联的进程分配的非分页系统内存量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory, in bytes, the system has allocated for the associated process that cannot be written to the virtual memory paging file.
trans-unit.target: 系统已为无法写入到虚拟内存分页文件的关联进程分配的内存量(以字节为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), which does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)，不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of nonpaged system memory, in bytes, allocated for the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 获取为关联的进程分配的非分页系统内存量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The amount of system memory, in bytes, allocated for the associated process that cannot be written to the virtual memory paging file.
trans-unit.target: 为关联的进程分配的、不能写入虚拟内存分页文件中的系统内存量(以字节为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this property represents the current size of nonpaged system memory used by the process, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 返回此属性的值表示使用的过程中，以字节为单位的非分页的系统内存的当前大小。

trans-unit.source: System memory is the physical memory used by the operating system, and is divided into paged and nonpaged pools.
trans-unit.target: 系统内存是由操作系统的物理内存，并且分为分页和非页面缓冲池。

trans-unit.source: Nonpaged memory allocations remain in system memory and are not paged out to the virtual memory paging file.
trans-unit.target: 非分页的内存分配保留在系统内存，并且不会调出到虚拟内存分页文件。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to monitor memory usage on computers with 32-bit processors or 64-bit processors.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于监视与 32 位处理器或 64 位处理器的计算机上的内存使用情况。

trans-unit.source: The property value is equivalent to the **Pool Nonpaged Bytes** performance counter for the process.
trans-unit.target: 属性值等于**池非分页字节数**进程的性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example starts an instance of the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例启动记事本应用程序的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The example then retrieves and displays various properties of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后检索并显示关联的进程的各种属性。

trans-unit.source: The example detects when the process exits, and displays its exit code and peak memory statistics.
trans-unit.target: 该示例检测时在进程退出，并显示其退出代码，峰值内存统计信息。

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), which does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 该平台是 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)，不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A> is the API method that raises the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A> 是引发的 API 方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>事件。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A> causes the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event to occur and is the only way to raise the event using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A>导致<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>事件发生，是唯一的方法来引发事件使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A> is primarily used when deriving classes from the component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A> 主要用于从组件派生类时。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A>, you can write your own event handler.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A>，你可以编写事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: You create your own event handler delegate and your own event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 创建你自己的事件处理程序委托和事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the Visual Studio environment, an event handler delegate (AddOnExited) and an event-handling method (Process1_Exited) are created for you when you drag a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component onto a form and double-click the icon.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在使用 Visual Studio 环境，一个事件处理程序委托 (AddOnExited) 和一个事件处理方法 (Process1_Exited) 会为您创建在拖动时<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>组件拖动到窗体并双击该图标。

trans-unit.source: The code you create to run when the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event occurs is entered into the Process1_Exited procedure.
trans-unit.target: 创建时要运行代码<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>进入 Process1_Exited 过程发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A> member, because it is implemented for you.
trans-unit.target: 不需要创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A>成员，因为它已为您实现。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For an overview, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关概述，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A> method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OnExited%2A>派生类中的方法。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs each time an application writes a line to its redirected <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput" /> stream.
trans-unit.target: 每次应用程序向其重定向 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput" /> 流中写入行时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> event indicates that the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> has written a line, terminating with a newline character, to its redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>事件指示关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>编写一条线路，以换行符，向其重定向终止<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流。

trans-unit.source: The event is enabled during asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该事件在异步读取操作期间启用上<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To start asynchronous read operations, you must redirect the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>, add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> event, and call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要开始异步读取的操作，必须重定向<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>，添加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>事件，并调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Thereafter, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> event signals each time the process writes a line to the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, until the process exits or calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此后，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>事件信号进程写入到的重定向行每次<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流式传输，直到该进程退出，或调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The application that is processing the asynchronous output should call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to ensure that the output buffer has been flushed.
trans-unit.target: 正在处理的异步输出应用程序应调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>方法，以确保已刷新输出缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to perform asynchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream of the `ipconfig` command.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何执行上的重定向的异步读取的操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流`ipconfig`命令。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an event delegate for the `OutputHandler` event handler and associates it with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建一个事件委托，它为`OutputHandler`事件处理程序并将其与关联<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives text lines from the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, formats the text, and saves it in an output string that’s later shown in the example’s console window.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序接收来自的重定向的文本行<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流，格式文本，并将其保存在更高版本显示在本示例的控制台窗口的输出字符串中。
